articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kang Ryon Hak
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kang Ryon Hak
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un on Wednesday sent a wreath to the bier of Kang Ryon Hak, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and presidium member of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea who is winner of Order of Kim Il Sung and National Reunification Prize, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Vice-Chairman of C.C., WPK Meets Member of Foreign Affairs Committee of British Labor Party
articles.content:
Vice-Chairman of C.C., WPK Meets Member of Foreign Affairs Committee of British Labor Party
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Wednesday met and had a talk with Glyn Ford, member of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the British Labor Party, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Meets New Egyptian Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets New Egyptian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Ho, foreign minister of the DPRK, had a talk with Sameh Lotfi Abdelhady, new Egyptian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him on Wednesday. 
					 The foreign minister welcomed the ambassador over his work in the DPRK.
					
					 He said that under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un the army and people of the DPRK are turning out as one in the drive to carry out the five-year strategic goal for national economic development set forth at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 He referred to the situation on the Korean peninsula worsening due to the U.S. ceaseless nuclear threat and sanctions and the justification of the DPRK's bolstering of nuclear deterrence reacting to them.
					
					 The ambassador said the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries are deeply rooted, special and inviolable relations, adding the two countries are proactively cooperating with each other in the international arena on the principle of mutual respect and non-interference of internal affairs.
					
					 The Egyptian government is attaching great importance to the relations with the DPRK, he said, stressing that during his tenure of office he would make active efforts to strengthen the bilateral relations in the political, economic, cultural and all other fields.

articles.title: UN Bodies to Render Cooperation to Afflicted Areas of Northern Part of North Hamgyong Province, DPRK
articles.content:
UN Bodies to Render Cooperation to Afflicted Areas of Northern Part of North Hamgyong Province, DPRK
 Pyongyang October 5 (KCNA) -- The United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs and the United Nations Children's Fund decided to render emergency cooperation to the DPRK as regards the flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of sympathy from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on October 3.
					 The president in the message said he received news that flood that hit North Hamgyong Province of the friendly DPRK recently, caused lots of damage in people's life, property, infrastructure, etc.
					
					 The message went on:
					
					 Sharing with you the sorrow over this big disaster, we express the deepest consolation to you, the government, people and victims of the DPRK on behalf of the Syrian Arab people and on my own behalf.
					
					 I express our sympathy and solidarity for the people of the friendly DPRK who suffered disaster and hope damage will be eradicated in the DPRK.
					
					 We believe that your country will overcome this ordeal and continue pushing forward construction and development under your wise guidance.

articles.title: Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected in Kaesong City
articles.content:
Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected in Kaesong City
 Kaesong, October 5 (KCNA) -- The statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were erected in Kaesong City.
					 A ceremony of unveiling the statues was held on Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam and others, officials of North Hwanghae Province and Kaesong city and those concerned, officials of units who contributed to erecting the statues, those of merits, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, working people, youths and students.
					
					 The statues were unveiled by leading officials of the party, state and army and those in North Hwanghae Province and Kaesong City.
					
					 Laid before the statues was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Also laid before the statues were a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the Cabinet of the DPRK and a floral basket in the name of the Kaesong citizens.
					
					 Placed there were floral baskets in the names of the party and power bodies, working people's organizations, institutions, enterprises, factories, farms and universities in the province and the city and units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the great leaders before their statues.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, made an unveiling address.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Kaesong City, once backward consumption city in the past, has turned into a city of modern light industry and a city of huge historical and cultural assets and where great change has taken place in the people's living. This would be unthinkable apart from the wise guidance of the great leaders who made ceaseless journey of patriotic devotion all their lives.
					
					 The speaker called upon all the service personnel and other people to dynamically advance to build a powerful socialist country, reunify the country and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, united closer around Kim Jong Un, while always looking up to the sunny image of the great leaders.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation and its members led by Co-Chairman Johnny Hon Wednesday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun. 
					 The guests paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 They made bows to the great leaders at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Gift to Kim Jong Un from Co-chairman of Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Gift to Kim Jong Un from Co-chairman of Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and gift from Johnny Hon, co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation.
					 Johnny Hon handed them to Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Second Meeting of Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Held
articles.content:
Second Meeting of Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Held
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The second meeting of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation took place here on Wednesday.
					 Present there were Chairman Kim Chang Ryong, Co-Chairman Johnny Hon and Vice-Chairman Keith Bennett of the council and its members.
					
					 The meeting reviewed the work of the council over the past one year after the first enlarged meeting of the council and set forth the action program.
					
					 They underlined the need to give wide publicity to the greatness of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who made undying contributions to accomplishing the cause of global independence and to develop the Foundation.
					
					 On the same day there was a general assembly of the foundation. 
					
					 Present at the general assembly were staffers of the council and officials of the Secretariat of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation.
					
					 The general assembly informed the participants of the successes and experience made in the work of the foundation since its founding and discussed the tasks and practical issues for carrying them out.
					
					 A letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the general assembly. 
					
					 The council gave a reception that day for the participants in the second meeting and the general assembly.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Second Meeting of Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Second Meeting of Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Wednesday received a letter from the participants in the second meeting of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation and the general assembly of members of the foundation.
					 The successful second meeting and the general assembly held here served as a significant occasion in deeply discussing the issues of positively promoting the greatness of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and expanding and developing the work of the foundation in a world-wide scale, the letter said.
					
					 It noted that they extended the warmest thanks and sincere greetings to Kim Jong Un who provided the second meeting and the general assembly this significant year in which the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea was held.
					
					 It pointed out that during the visit to the DPRK, they witnessed shining events taking place in the DPRK and this firmly convinced them once again that all victories made by the Korean people are achieved under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 It said that keeping in their minds the pride and self-respect as members of the foundation, they would take giant step forward in the sacred work to expand and develop the foundation as the one of the whole of mankind, while keeping pace with the Korean people who are dynamically advancing toward a powerful socialist country.
					
					 It noted that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will be immortal in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also world progressives loving peace and justice thanks to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Participants in Cycling Journey for Reunification Feted
articles.content:
Participants in Cycling Journey for Reunification Feted
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The Committee for Aiding Overseas Compatriots of Korea and the north side preparatory committee for the joint meeting of the political parties, organizations and individual personages in the north, the south and abroad for peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula hosted a reception at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday in honor of the participants in a cycling journey for reunification of the Chinese regional preparatory committee for the joint meeting.
					 Present there on invitation were the members of the group of the cycling journey for reunification of the Chinese regional preparatory committee headed by Co-Vice Chairman Choe Su Bong, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Chol, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is chairman of the north side preparatory committee for the joint meeting, and officials concerned.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Appeal to All Koreans
articles.content:
Appeal to All Koreans
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The participants in a cycling journey for reunification of the Chinese regional preparatory committee for the joint meeting of the political parties, organizations and individual personages in the north, the south and abroad for peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula published an appeal to all the Koreans on Tuesday.
					 The appeal said the Chinese regional preparatory committee of the joint meeting made the cycling journey for peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula on the ninth anniversary of the October 4 declaration but it was not linked to the south via Panmunjom.
					
					 It is a great disgrace of the Korean nation that has lived in the same land with a time-honored history spanning five thousand years still remains as the only divided nation on the earth, becoming a pronoun of confrontation and war, the appeal noted.
					
					 It called for successfully holding the nationwide great meeting for reunification at any cost and opening a wide avenue to independent reunification.
					
					 It called upon all the Koreans to advance under the unfurled banner of national independence and great national unity.
					
					 It also called upon all the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad to turn out to drive the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces out of south Korea, provide a blue sky of eternal peace over the three thousand-ri and resolutely oppose the present south Korean authorities' heinous policy of escalating conformation with the compatriots.
					
					 Noting that the Chinese regional preparatory committee for the joint meeting will more valiantly struggle till the day when it will cycle from Pyongyang to Seoul, shouting hurrah for reunification, the appeal stressed that no one can block the advance of the Koreans who have turned out in the nationwide great march for reunification.

articles.title: Lao Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Lao Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Phonekham Inthaboualy, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials helped Korean farmers at the Korea-Laos Friendship Sosin Co-op Farm with their work on Wednesday.
					 The farm is situated in Ryokpho District, Pyongyang.
					
					 The guests laid a bouquet before a mosaic of President Kim Il Sung at the farm and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Being briefed on the feats performed by him for the farm, they helped farmers with their rice harvest.
					
					 They handed over aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: National Exhibition of Information Sci-tech Achievements of University Students Opens
articles.content:
National Exhibition of Information Sci-tech Achievements of University Students Opens
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of information sci-tech achievements made by university students opened with due ceremony at the Sci-Tech Complex on Wednesday.
					 On display there were at least 1 300 inventions and IT products made by university students from across the country through their scientific researches.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were officials concerned and officials of the youth league and university students.

articles.title: Workers, Trade Union Members Meet
articles.content:
Workers, Trade Union Members Meet
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) held a meeting at the cultural house of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex on Wednesday to celebrate the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and its 71st founding anniversary.
					 Attending the meeting were officials concerned, officials and members of the GFTUK and workers.
					
					 Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the GFTUK, made a report which was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the WPK is the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il which has created a new history of building the revolutionary party and the history of eternal victory under their leadership for seven decades.
					
					 Thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un the WPK is shining as the great party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, and the rosy future of the Juche revolution is surely guaranteed, they said.
					
					 They called upon the workers, officials and members of the GFTUK to uphold Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as the sun of Juche eternally to glorify their idea of party building and exploits down through generations.
					
					 They called upon all workers and trade union members to fully demonstrate the revolutionary spirit of the heroic Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's working class in the general offensive and charge to thoroughly implement the five-year strategy for national economic development set forth at the Seventh Congress of the WPK.

articles.title: State Academic Degrees, Titles Conferred on Intellectuals
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees, Titles Conferred on Intellectuals
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- State academic degrees and titles were conferred on intellectuals, who made positive contributions to building an economic power and improving the people's standard of living.
					 Pak Hak Chol, faculty head of Kim Il Sung University, and seven others were awarded the title of candidate academician.
					
					 Professorship went to Ju Su In, teacher at Pyongyang University of Architecture, and 18 others.
					
					 Doctorate was conferred on Choe Chang Su, department director of the University of National Economy, Yom Tae Son, department head of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Han Jong Chol, department head of Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, and others and titles of associate professor on 126 persons and master's degrees on 807 persons.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday.

articles.title: Priority Given to Educational Work in Disaster Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
Priority Given to Educational Work in Disaster Areas of DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- A priority has been given to the rehabilitation of nurseries, kindergartens and schools in the flood-hit areas of North Hamgyong Province, the DPRK.
					 Measures were taken before anything else to supply teaching apparatuses and school things for continued education in the disaster areas.
					
					 Meanwhile, a work was launched on a full scale to repair partially destroyed schools and build tens of kindergartens and schools on a fresh way.
					
					 Thanks to the devoted efforts of soldier-builders, a foundation-making project for overall educational facilities was finished and several new kindergartens took their shapes one after another.
					
					 Besides, steps were taken to provide the best educational conditions to the newly built schools.

articles.title: Power Supply System in Disaster Areas Restored
articles.content:
Power Supply System in Disaster Areas Restored
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The power supply system has been restored in the main in flood-hit North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.
					 Damaged transformer substations and transmission lines were all repaired in sections of more than 260 kilometers. Mast restoration makes headway at 95 percent and a project for distribution line is now at the final stage.
					
					 The power rehabilitation project needed tens of tons of steel and electric wire, insulators, disconnecting switches and transformers, removal of earth of 8,000 cubic meters and production of thousands of masts.
					
					 Transformer substations in Musan and Yonsa counties, Hoeryong City and other disaster areas were restored until September 27 to put the transmission system in the province on a normal operation.

articles.title: More Consumer Goods Sent to Disaster Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
More Consumer Goods Sent to Disaster Areas of DPRK
Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- A campaign for supplying more consumer goods to flood-hit North Hamgyong Province is getting more brisk at various industrial establishments of the DPRK.
					 The February 8 Vinalon Complex raised the output of chemical goods by succeeding in the production of quality acetic acid with domestic materials and repairing the cooler on its own efforts.
					
					 The Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory under the Pyongyang Foodstuff Complex additionally turned out tens of tons of sweets and cakes for the inhabitants in the disaster areas in a short span of time.
					
					 The Hamhung Knitwear Factory has carried out its daily production plan at 115 percent and the Pyongyang Hosiery Factory produced hundreds of thousands of stockings and socks in a few days.
					
					 Meanwhile, utensils, footwear and other consumer goods have been mass-produced at light industrial factories across the country for the smooth recovery efforts in the disaster areas.

articles.title: Korean Feature Film "Trace of Military Service" Produced
articles.content:
Korean Feature Film "Trace of Military Service" Produced
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The Korean April 25 Film Studio produced feature film "Trace of Military Service".
					 The film depicts a commanding officer of a transport battalion of the Korean People's Army giving full play to the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and hard fortitude in order to contribute to rounding off the unit's preparations for combat by saving even a drop of fuel oil during the arduous march.

articles.title: Women Football Referees of DPRK Estimated in Olympiad
articles.content:
Women Football Referees of DPRK Estimated in Olympiad
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Ri Hyang Ok and Hong Kum Nyo, international women football referees from the DPRK, won a high appreciation at the 31st Olympic Games.
					 During the games, they had been active as chief umpire and sub-umpire at several women football matches.
					
					 The director of the FIFA Refereeing Department said that Ri and Hong showed themselves as a model football referee and the FIFA felt high pride of having such competent referees.
					
					 An official of the Asian Football Confederation said the DPRK's international referees represent the authority of the AFC at the Women's World Cup and the Olympic women's football games, hoping that they would make greater contribution to the development of Asian and world women's football.
					
					 In an interview with KCNA, Ri Hyang Ok expressed her will to steadily improve her quality as a referee and thus display the honor of the country to the full.

articles.title: Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Party Founding Museum
articles.content:
Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Party Founding Museum
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) visited the Party Founding Museum Wednesday on the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They looked round historical relics and mementoes displayed, being briefed on the fact that President Kim Il Sung founded the Party right after the liberation of the country on the basis of laying the organizational and ideological foundation of the party founding in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and developed the Workers' Party of Korea into the general staff of the revolution.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bringing Earlier Final Victory of Juche Revolution
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bringing Earlier Final Victory of Juche Revolution
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday dedicates an article to the first anniversary of the publication of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-victorious".
					 The work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), serves as important guidelines for developing the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) into the eternal party of the leaders and accomplishing  the revolutionary cause of Juche which started on Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The article says:
					
					 Over the past one year since the publication of the work the leadership authority and militant might of the WPK have remarkably grown stronger under the unfurled great banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the validity of the cause of the popular masses for independence and the socialist cause led by the Party and the necessity of its victory have been more clearly proved.
					
					 The work serves as a treasured sword the army and people of the DPRK should hold fast to for winning a certain victory as it indicates precious guidelines for carrying forward and accomplishing the cause of the great party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il down through generations.
					
					 The WPK has been strengthened to be the party of the great leaders, the revolutionary party of Juche type and creditably played its role as the organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people in the historic struggle for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche for decades since its founding. This is ascribable to the great leaders' Juche-based idea of party building and their wise guidance.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's work is an encyclopedia and immortal great programme for building a revolutionary party as it comprehensively deals with the precious feats the great leaders performed in successfully settling all problems arising in the struggle to found and strengthen the Party.
					
					 The article calls upon all the officials, party members and other working people to take hold on the ideas indicated by Kim Jong Un in his work as the lifeline and thoroughly apply them, thus bringing earlier the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Arch Nuclear Crimina
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Arch Nuclear Criminal
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is working hard to conceal its criminal nature as a wrecker of global peace and security and mastermind of a nuclear arms race but in vain, says Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Korean peninsula is now on the brink of a war as the U.S. is mobilizing almost all types of the triad strategic nuclear strike means for its saber-rattling. This grave situation clearly proves once again that the U.S. is the arch criminal bringing a nuclear disaster to humankind. 
					
					 The DPRK opted for going nuclear to protect its power, revolution and people from the U.S. constant nuclear war threats. 
					
					 It is a stark reality on the Korean peninsula that the sovereignty of a country and the security of its people can not be protected, nor can the world denuclearization be realized as long as there is the inequitable structure under which hostile forces' unilateral nuclear threat and blackmail and war moves are allowed.
					
					 It is a legitimate independent right of the DPRK as a sovereign state to have an access to the powerful strike means against the U.S. to protect the security of the country and people from the U.S. constant threats.
					
					 The DPRK will steadily bolster up its nuclear deterrent both in quality and quantity to fundamentally defuse the danger of a nuclear war created by the U.S. and protect the peace in the region and the rest of the world.

articles.title: Option Is Not U.S. Monopoly: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Option Is Not U.S. Monopoly: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- U.S. Secretary of Defense Carter, recently recalling a precedent in which it planned a surgical operation against nuclear facilities of the DPRK, reeled off provocative outbursts that north Korea should never be allowed to pose a nuclear threat to the U.S. and the U.S. forces present in south Korea are ready to go into action at once.
					 Hayden, newly designated as commander of the U.S. Strategic Force, and Marlon, former chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff, blustered that the most possible option for defusing threat of north Korea to the U.S. at the present stage is to make a strategic raid or missile strike at nuclear and missile bases of north Korea and that it is necessary to make a preemptive strike at north Korea.
					
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a commentary: 
					
					 This proves that the U.S. has chosen to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK and stepped up its preparations despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK and protest and denunciation from the international community.
					
					 Peace is dearer to the DPRK but it has no idea of begging the U.S. for peace, allowing the sovereignty and dignity of the country to be encroached upon.
					
					 Toughest counteraction is the DPRK's invariable mode of struggle against the enemy. The DPRK will never waver or flinch even an inch from the decisive battle against the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The DPRK will unhesitatingly take effective military countermeasures including preemptive strike, leaving no means untried, as it has the powerful treasured nuclear sword to deal merciless retaliatory sledge- hammer blows at the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and a legitimate right to self-defence.
					
					 The U.S. should not forget that option is not its monopoly.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flays U.S., S. Korean Puppet Warmongers for Staging North-targeted War Maneuvers
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flays U.S., S. Korean Puppet Warmongers for Staging North-targeted War Maneuvers
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers staged a war maneuver for "precision strike" at ground targets of the DPRK in the East Sea of Korea with guided-missile destroyer, Aegis destroyer and other warships, sea patrol planes and anti-submarine helicopters involved.
					 The warmongers advertised the saber-rattling as one to cope with "imminent provocation" of someone.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary condemns it as a grave military provocation against the DPRK and an unpardonable act of wrecking peace as it was obviously part of the advance preparations for mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 It was, at the same time, a product of collusion and conspiracy of the Park Geun Hye group to prolong their dirty remaining days by intensifying the moves for a war against the north with the backing of the gangster-like U.S. master to threaten the DPRK with muscle-flexing through the involvement of latest war hardware, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are vociferating about "imminent provocation" of someone, "the north's potential nuclear threat" and the like but it is nothing but sheer sophism to conceal their scenario to ignite a nuclear war.
					
					 It is the unchangeable nature of the U.S. to perpetrate aggression and war and the unconditional submission to the U.S. master and the pursuance of his line are the south Korean puppet forces' inveterate mode of existence. The scheme of the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors to trigger off a nuclear war against the north, not content with their unprecedented offensive to stifle it in all realms, has gone beyond the danger line.
					
					 There can be no mercy to the enemy of the nation and reunification.
					
					 If the aggressors and provocateurs dare mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK, they will not be able to escape a merciless, nuclear retaliatory strike of justice.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Had Better Heed DPRK's Warning: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Had Better Heed DPRK's Warning: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces' scenario for "a preemptive attack" on the DPRK is being put into practice.
					 Shortly ago, the U.S. staged a drill under the simulated conditions of making "precision strikes" at the building of the supreme headquarters of the DPRK, Nyongbyon nuclear facilities and its major strategic rocket bases by introducing guided-missile destroyer and a sea patrol plane of the U.S. navy into the East Sea of Korea and mobilizing guided-missile destroyers of the south Korean puppet navy. 
					
					 It is mulling escalating military actions under the simulated conditions of "preemptive strike" at the DPRK in the sky, land and sea with huge armed forces including the nuclear carrier task group and NATO forces involved.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group went busy inspecting frontline units of the puppet army, crying out for "turning the north into a huge cemetery at single strike." They are staging a rehearsal for conducting "a beheading operation" after establishing "triad strike system" for carrying out "a large-scale retaliatory operation plan." 
					
					 As the international community unanimously terms the U.S. and south Korean warmongers' saber-rattling "a drill for making precision strike, a rehearsal at the level of actual operation," the enemies' scenario for mounting a "preemptive attack" on the DPRK is being openly carried out at the stage of the operation for regime change after going beyond the boundary of military drill. Herein lies its adventurous nature.
					
					 By daring regard the supreme headquarters which represents the destiny of all Koreans as the "target of preemptive attack," the warmongers have gone beyond the danger line in their military hysteria and this makes the DPRK's army hard to repress its towering resentment.
					
					 The prevailing situation once again brought to light the U.S. and its stooges' true colors as a wrecker and disturber of peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK's revolutionary armed forces had already clarified their stand how to deal with those who hurt the supreme dignity of the DPRK and aggressors and warmongers who seek to invade the inviolable territory of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has made a switchover in its mode of counteraction to cope with the enemies' military hysteria to that of preemptive attack and its striking groups are fully ready to go into an action to mount a preemptive attack on them.
					
					 It is quite easy for the Korean People's Army to put the military actions in south Korea and its vicinity under control as the former has all aggressive bases in the U.S. mainland and Pacific operation bases within the range of its strikes.
					
					 The closer they come in attack, the clearer the target will become and the more readily the DPRK's countermeasure will be taken.
					
					 The warmongers would be well advised to think twice over the warning of the DPRK's revolutionary armed forces.

articles.title: Persons of Disabilities in S. Korea Stage Action against Park Geun Hye Group's Unpopular Rule
articles.content:
Persons of Disabilities in S. Korea Stage Action against Park Geun Hye Group's Unpopular Rule
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Persons of disabilities in south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on Sept. 28 at which they declared they would launch an action in protest against the unpopular rule of the Park Geun Hye group.
					 At the meeting, the speakers denounced the regime for making public the 2017 budget which drastically cut down the funds for the persons of disabilities and other socially vulnerable persons.
					
					 Violence is not just firing water cannon but such social system itself means violence, they said, calling upon persons of disabilities to turn out in the struggle to survive on this land.

articles.title: S. Korean Business Bodies Launch 100-Day Sit-in Strike
articles.content:
S. Korean Business Bodies Launch 100-Day Sit-in Strike
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The emergency measure committee of south-north economic cooperation enterprises and the consultative council of businessmen for Mt. Kumgang in south Korea on October 3 declared they would launch a 100-day sit-in strike in demand of the compensation for the losses caused by the south Korean puppet authorities' anti-DPRK confrontation policy and improvement of the inter-Korean relations.
					 The bodies said they would launch a 100-day sit-in strike including a rally for guaranteeing vital rights and the improvement of the south-north relations on the ninth anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The emergency measure committee of the south-north economic cooperation enterprises staged a demonstration in Seoul on Tuesday as part of the 100-day sit-in strike.

articles.title: History of Kim Il Sung University Introduced by Russian Magazine
articles.content:
History of Kim Il Sung University Introduced by Russian Magazine
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- A Russian on-line magazine carried a write-up on September 30 to observe the 70th founding anniversary of Kim Il Sung University.
					 The magazine in an article titled "Highest seat of Juche-oriented science and education" illustrated with a photo of the statue of leader Kim Jong Il at the university said:
					
					 The history of Kim Il Sung University is the history of the guidance of the great Comrades Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung, regarding the education and training of native cadres as the most important state affair related to the destiny of the country and nation, guided the building of the university despite the difficult and complicated situation after the country's liberation.
					
					 Finally, Kim Il Sung University, the university for the people, was founded on October 1, 1946.
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il studied at the university.
					
					 Right after enrolling at the university on September 1, 1960, he climbed Ryongnam Hill, where he took an historic oath to glorify Korea.
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Un made sure that the statue of Comrade Kim Jong Il was erected at the university associated with his undying exploits. 
					
					 We are sure that Kim Il Sung University will as ever train more excellent native cadres to contribute to building a socialist power.

articles.title: German Body Condemns S. Korean Regime's Smear Campaign against DPRK
articles.content:
German Body Condemns S. Korean Regime's Smear Campaign against DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany released a statement on September 29 censuring the south Korean puppet regime of traitors for conducting a smear campaign against the DPRK over the flood damage in its northern area.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The south Korean regime, seized with extreme misanthropy and confrontation with the compatriots in the north, are malignantly hurting the DPRK over the severe disaster that hit its northern area.
					
					 When flood hit south Korea in the 1980s, the DPRK sent a lot of relief goods to south Korea.
					
					 But the south Korean regime is terming the on-going all-out struggle of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to eradicate the aftermath of the flood and turn misfortune into a blessing "forced hard labor." 
					
					 This shows that the regime is just a pack of hooligans.

articles.title: DPRK's Bolstering of Nuclear Deterrent Supported by Russian Body
articles.content:
DPRK's Bolstering of Nuclear Deterrent Supported by Russian Body
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK released a statement on September 29 supporting the DPRK's bolstering of nuclear deterrent.
					 Noting the world public is getting increasingly vocal in condemning the U.S. imperialists and their followers for working hard to stifle the DPRK, the statement said:
					
					 One hundred and tens of countries, the majority of UN member states, are opposing and rejecting the on-going unprecedented moves of the U.S. to isolate the DPRK from the international community and stifle it.
					
					 The U.S. and other forces hostile to the DPRK are getting ever more desperate in their moves of aggression on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is the present reality that innocent people are suffering pain in many countries due to the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 The Korean people firmly preserving the sovereignty of their country are the model of the progressive mankind struggling for global independence.
					
					 Nuclear weapons are the only means for protecting world peace and security and making the U.S. and other aggressors not go on the rampage.
					
					 We support the DPRK steadily bolstering its nuclear deterrent and wish its people bigger successes in building a socialist power.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Kang Ryon Hak
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Kang Ryon Hak
Pyongyang, 5 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Presidente Kim Jong Un envio el dia 5 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Kang Ryon Hak, diputado a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, condecorado con el Premio Kim Il Sung y el Premio Reunificacion de la Patria y miembro de la presidencia del Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Aparatos de ONU deciden brindar cooperacion urgente a la RPDC
articles.content:
Aparatos de ONU deciden brindar cooperacion urgente a la RPDC
Pyongyang, 5 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que las zonas septentrionales de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte fueron afectadas por las inundaciones, la Oficina de Coordinacion de Asuntos Humanitarios de la ONU y el UNICEF decidieron brindar cooperacion urgente a la RPDC.

articles.title: Levantadas en Kaesong las estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Levantadas en Kaesong las estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Kaesong, 5 de octubre (ACNC) -- Fueron levantadas en la ciudad de Kaesong las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Tuvo lugar este miercoles la ceremonia de descubrimiento de las estatuas de bronce.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam y otros cuadros, los funcionarios de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte, la ciudad de Kaesong y de la rama interesada, los funcionarios y ameritados de las unidades que contribuyeron al levantamiento de las estatuas de bronce, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					El descubrimiento de las estatuas lo hicieron los cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado, el ejercito, la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte y la ciudad de Kaesong.
					
					Al pie de las estatuas fue colocado un cesto de flores a nombre de Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del EPC. 
					
					Tambien, fueron puestos un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central del PTC, el Comite de Estado de la RPDC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, y el otro a nombre de los habitantes de la ciudad de Kaesong.
					
					Luego, fueron depositados los cestos de flores a nombre de los organos del partido y el Poder, entidades de masas,  organismos, empresas, fabricas, granjas y universidades de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte y la ciudad de Kaesong, las unidades del EPC y del ESIPC, etc. 
					
					Los participantes rindieron sublime homenaje a los grandes Lideres ante sus estatuas.
					
					El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y presidente del Presidium de la APS de la RPDC.
					
					El orador dijo que Kaesong, que era un atrasada ciudad de consumo, se ha convertido en la moderna ciudad de industria ligera y la historica y cultural con muchos patrimonios nacionales, y se ha registrado gran cambio en la vida de los moradores, gracias a la sabia orientacion de los grandes Lideres quienes estuvieron siempre en el camino de abnegacion patriotica. 
					
					Llamo a todos a unirse mas compactamente en torno al Presidente Kim Jong Un guardando en lo profundo del corazon las imagenes de los grandes Lideres antecesores y luchar con dinamismo por la construccion de una potencia socialista, por la reunificacion de la patria y por el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.

articles.title: Efectuada segunda reunion del Consejo de Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Efectuada segunda reunion del Consejo de Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 5 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 5 en esta capital la segunda reunion del Consejo de la Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il.
					Tomaron parte el presidente Kim Chang Ryong, el copresidente Johnny Hon, el vicepresidente Keith Bennet y otros miembros del Consejo.
					
					La reunion hizo balance de los trabajos de un ano pasado despues de la primera reunion ampliada del Consejo y presento el rumbo futuro de sus actividades.
					
					Dio enfasis la necesidad de dinamizar la propaganda de la grandeza del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quienes realizaron las proezas imborrables en el cumplimiento de la causa de independencia del mundo y activar las labores de la fundacion.
					
					El mismo dia, hubo la asamblea general de la Fundacion
					
					Estuvieron presentes los empleados del consejo y otros miembros de la Fundacion, y los funcionarios del Secretariado del Consejo de la Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il. En la ocasion se informaron los exitos y experiencias alcanzados en el pasado despues de la constitucion de la Fundacion y se debatieron las tareas asumidas a los miembros y los problemas de trabajo para cumplirlas.
					
					Por ultimo, quedo aprobada una carta al Presidente Kim Jong Un.
					
					El mismo dia, el Consejo de la Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il ofrecio un banquete en honor a los participantes en la segunda reunion del Consejo y en la asamblea general de la Fundacion.
